Detailed Description

template<class BBOX>
class OverlapDetector< BBOX >

Contains pixelboxes to be checked for overlap.

template<class BBOX>
bool OverlapDetector< BBOX >::addIfNotOverlapping (  const vector< BBOX > &  inboxes  )  [inline]
 

If none of the supplied bboxes overlap the boxes in the list, then add all.

If one overlaps, add none.
